product_name: Cannondale Nitro L.E. Bike Shorts - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: High-performance bike shorts for long rides and personal bests, the men's Cannondale Nitro L.E. bike shorts offer excellent moisture wicking and a breathable chamois for all-day comfort in the saddle. Quick-drying fabric blend offers both stretch and compression, and a special fabric makeup offers superior moisture-wicking to keep you comfortable when working up a sweat. You'll pedal longer without discomfort thanks to the seamless, breathable chamois that uses multiple densities of foam to ensure a comfortable fit in the saddle. 10-panel construction contours to the body, eliminating wind drag. Elastic leg grippers with silicone keep Cannondale Nitro L.E. shorts in place. Small zippered rear pocket holds a key, card or gel. Closeout.
